tool_description: API showing publications, symptoms, treatment, funding, and grants for medical and health.
name: Healthy
title: Healthy

api_list.name: Specific clinicalstudies
api_list.description: this one is specific to a large list of publications for medical conditions, and trials.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://healthy.p.rapidapi.com/symptoms/clinicalstudies"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "healthy.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://healthy.p.rapidapi.com/symptoms/{researchid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "healthy.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get latest Grant requirements, and medical research news
api_list.description: This endpoint will return clinical data, trials, publications, grant and funding information as well as requirements and how to apply.
